name: Perrigo Company plc
description: Perrigo Company plc is a global leader in the self-care and consumer health industry, dedicated to making lives better by providing quality healthcare products. Founded in 1887, Perrigo has a storied history of innovation and commitment to delivering over-the-counter (OTC) consumer goods and pharmaceutical products. The company operates through a variety of segments, including Consumer Self-Care Americas, Consumer Self-Care International, and Prescription Pharmaceuticals. Perrigo's extensive portfolio includes a wide range of products, such as pain relief, allergy relief, digestive health, and infant nutrition. The company is recognized for its strong focus on quality and safety, which is evident in its commitment to rigorous testing and regulation compliance. In recent years, Perrigo has made significant strides in expanding its product offerings and market presence through strategic acquisitions and partnerships. With a mission to empower consumers to take charge of their health, Perrigo continues to invest in research and development to innovate and adapt to changing consumer needs in an ever-evolving healthcare landscape. The company is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland, and serves customers across the globe, reflecting its dedication to enhancing health and well-being.
